title: WTT HOFers for lower pop mid-tier backs (Put a price on Sov150 Lajoie 1/20)
author: Luke

posts.post_title: WTT HOFers for lower pop mid-tier backs (Put a price on Sov150 Lajoie 1/20)
posts.post_content:
Sov150 Lajoie $525 Paypal friend/fam

I have a group of HOFers that I am dangling as trade bait to try and shake some low pop commons loose.  My AB460, BL350, OM, and Tolstoi want lists are below.  I am also interested in many Cycle 350 and 460 combos.

I have a ton of other trade stuff in addition to these pics I've attached.  Also have cash to add to any deal.

Thanks for looking!
